encyclopedia.content: unusual 词性及解释 Part of speech and defination a. 不寻常的， 罕见的， 与众不同的 例句 Sentences A very unusual taste. 味道非常特别。 Has anything unusual happened? 有什么不平常的事发生了吗？ strikingly odd or unusual. 引人注目的奇怪或者不同寻常。 strikingly strange or unusual. 引人注目的奇怪或者不同寻常。 This is quite unusual. 这是很少有的。 形容词 不平常的；稀有的；奇特的 It was not unusual f

entry.tran: 不寻常的；不常见的；罕见的
entry.def: If something is unusual, it does not happen very often or you do not see it or hear it very often.

example.ex: They have replanted many areas with rare and unusual plants...
example.tran: 他们在许多地方重新种上了珍稀植物。

example.ex: To be appreciated as a parent is quite unusual.

entry.tran: 异于常人的；与众不同的；不同凡响的
entry.def: If you describe someone as unusual, you think that they are interesting and different from other people.

example.ex: He was an unusual man with great business talents.
example.tran: 此人不同凡响，具有异常敏锐的商业头脑。

means.word_mean: 1. not usual or common or ordinary;
2. being definitely out of the ordinary and unexpected; slightly odd or even a bit weird;

sentences.sentence: "what a strange sense of humor she has"

Sentence.sentence: Caught in the Web A few months ago, it wasn't unusual for 47-year-old Carla Toebe to spend 15 hours per day online

Almost every child, on the first day he sets foot in a school building, is smarter, more curious, less afraid of what he doesn't know, better at finding and figuring things out, more confident, resourceful (机敏的), persistent and independent than he will ever be again in his schooling – or, unless he is very unusual and very lucky, for the rest of his life.
The unusual warm currents in the Pacific Ocean.
Bias against blacks has experienced an unusual drop.

means.word_mean: 罕有的, 异乎寻常的

sentences.en: It was an unusual day for summer, damp and chilly.
sentences.cn: 这是夏季少有的一天, 又湿又凉。

sentences.en: The boy's unusual behaviour puzzled the doctor.
sentences.cn: 这男孩的异常行为使医生困惑不解。

sentences.en: It is unusual to see snow in this region.

jushi.english: It was an unusual day for summer, damp and chilly.
jushi.chinese: 这是夏季少有的一天,又湿又凉。
